fields.name: ACQUA DI PARMA COLONIA SANDALO (100ML) - Men's Aftershave Perfume Spray
fields.description: The top notes of Acqua di Parma Colonia Sandalo consist of bergamot, orange, and lemon. The heart notes are lavender, petitgrain, and cardamom. The base notes include sandalwood, tonka bean, and patchouli. The bergamot, orange, and lemon in the top notes give the fragrance a fresh and citrusy opening. The heart notes of lavender, petitgrain, and cardamom add a herbal and spicy touch to the scent.

fields.name: ARMANI ACQUA DI GIO PROFONDO (75ML) - Men's Aftershave Perfume Spray
fields.description: Like taking a plunge into the deep blue sea, senses are awakened by green mandarin and bergamot while an ultramarine, nearly icy hue is conveyed by Acqua di Giò's iconic marine notes. As the bubbles of oxygen rise to the top, the rosemary, lavender, cypress and lentisk absolute blend at its heart. Exuding a masculine character of depth and intensity, notes of woody patchouli and enveloping musk finally fuse with the saline accent of a mineral ambery accord at the base.

fields.name: ARMANI ACQUA DI GIO - Men's gift Set
fields.description: The classic Acqua Di Gio for Men by Giorgio Armani is a simply gorgeous scent of freedom, inspired by the elements; the freshness of the sea, the scorching Mediterranean sun. A perfect blend of sweet and salty notes with sharp notes of spices, softened with a woody, musky base.

fields.name: AZZARO WANTED BY NIGHT - Men's Gift Set
fields.description: Azzaro Wanted by Night is announced as an explosive woody and spicy oriental of unabashed sensuality, a blend of temptation and masculinity. The composition mixes exotic woods and spices, and highlights the three main accords: cinnamon, red cedar and tobacco.

fields.name: AZZARO POUR HOMME NAUGHTY LEATHER (100ML) - Men's Aftershave Spray
fields.description: Is strong, confident, seductive and dynamic. The intense notes of davana and leather create a powerful fragrance which is intensely woody and oriental. Sweet notes of vanilla add an elegant sensuality to a masculine mysterious olfactory delight. Carnal desire emerges from the shadows and light.

fields.name: BURBERRY LONDON (100ML) - Men's Aftershave Spray
fields.description: A sophisticated scent with notes of lavender, bergamot and warm cinnamon perfectly balanced with heart notes of leather and mimosa with tobacco leaves and oak moss make this a truly refined fragrance.

fields.name: BURBERRY MR BURBERRY (50ML) - Men's Aftershave Spray
fields.description: Fresh top notes of crisp zesty grapefruit, with a seductive base of earthy vetiver and smoky guaiac wood.

fields.name: CALVIN KLEIN EUPHORIA MEN (30ML) - Men's Aftershave Spray
fields.description: Euphoria Men by Calvin Klein is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. An addictive and evocative scent arouses all the senses. The fragrance is a refreshing, woody fragrance containing ginger, pepper, black basil, sage, cedar, amber, patchouli, Brazilian redwood and suede.

fields.name: M CALVI-GIFTSET-045
fields.description: As the scent lingers, it combines with the middle notes of coriander, lily, orange blossom, and juniper berries, adding a subtle yet exotic aroma to your senses. Finally, the base notes of sandalwood, amber, musk, and vetiver take over, creating an unmistakable air of sophistication and sensuality.

fields.name: CALVIN KLEIN ETERNITY FOR MEN REFLECTIONS (100ML) - Men's Aftershave Spray
fields.description: The fragrance opens with the lush herbal note of absinthe, before settling on a sweet delight chocolatey heart note. Oakmoss and sandalwood create a woodsy mysterious finish which completes this intriguing and unique scent.

fields.name: CAROLINA HERRERA BAD BOY - Men's Gift Set
fields.description: Contrasting layers build the composition of this scent. Fresh bergamot with punchy notes of pepper from a confident opening. At the heart lies herby, aromatic notes of cedar and sage. The base is strong with rich tonka bean and woody accords for a masculine finish.

fields.name: CAROLINA HERRERA BAD BOY COLBALT - Men's Gift Set
fields.description: The fragrance opens with notes of pink pepper which are enhanced by a floral yet masculine geranium heart. The mineral accents of the truffle accord base are invigorated with smoky oakwood and infused with ethically sourced vetiver and sexy cedarwood.

fields.name: CAROLINA HERRERA 212 VIP (100ML) - Men's Aftershave Spray
fields.description: Are you on the list? Join the private party with 212 VIP Men from Carolina Herrera, inspired by the scent and attitude of the most exclusive parties.

fields.name: DAVIDOFF HOT WATER (110ML) - Aftershave Spray
fields.description: Is an oriental-spicy fragrance for men. Davidoff heats things up this time with this hot and fiery scen.

fields.name: DIESEL BAD INTENSE (50ML) - Men's Aftershave Perfume Spray
fields.description: A masculine fragrance for a man who lives for seduction and never gets enough. Diesel Bad Intense is a sizzling take on the tobacco-caviar signature of their popular Bad fragrance. The scent reveals itself with a sharp sparkle of bergamot. Before you know it, a hot cocktail of nutmeg and cinnamon inflamed the caviar accord. Tobacco and woody notes burning.

fields.name: DIESEL SOUND OF THE BRAVE (50ML) - Men's Aftershave Spray
fields.description: The fragrance is an oriental fougère with aromatic bison grass accord and lavandin essence resonating against each other, creating a perfect flow at the heart of the fragrance. Mixed in on top, spicy juniper essence and invigorating lemon essence bounce and vibrate. The end is an intense base of warm amber woods and sensual musks.

fields.name: DIESEL FUEL FOR LIFE - Men's Gift Set
fields.description: Cavallier, is an energetic magic potion of star anise, raspberry and heliotrope that will keep you coming back for more.

fields.name: DIESEL D BY DIESEL - Men's Gift set
fields.description: Addressing a new era for Diesel D by Diesel is an aromatic gender-fluid fragrance.

fields.name: DOLCE & GABBANA K (50ML) - Men's Aftershave Perfume Spray
fields.description: This effortlessly joyful fragrance opens with notes of blood orange, zingy Sicilian lemon and tangy juniper berries. The heart is a unique twist of aromatic notes, smooth fig nectar and clary sage. The fragrance finishes with a sensual base formed of patchouli, cedar and vetiver.

fields.name: DOLCE & GABBANA POUR HOMME INTENSO (75ML) - Men's Aftershave Perfume Spray
fields.description: Dolce & Gabbana Intenso is a woody aromatic fragrance, whose profound appeal is defined by a brand new discovery in the olfactory world: the Moepel accord which has been re-created from the flowers and leaves of the Milkwood tree using Headspace technology.

fields.name: DOLCE & GABBANA K (50ML) - Men's Aftershave Spray
fields.description: This effortlessly joyful fragrance opens with notes of blood orange, zingy Sicilian lemon and tangy Juniper berries. This instantly refreshes and energizes the wearer, taking inspiration from the Mediterranean air. The heart is a unique twist of aromatic, herby notes with a kick of fiery Pimento. The fragrance is finished with a sensual base formed of Cedar, Vetiver and Patchouli.

fields.name: DOLCE & GABBANA THE ONE GREY (30ML) - Men's Aftershave Spray
fields.description: A playful fusion of spicy and aromatic notes takes place. Bitter grapefruit is combined with aromatic and herbal notes of coriander, cardamom and basil to introduce the scent. Lavender powers the heart alongside geranium and clary sage. The One For Men's signature combination of warm tobacco and woody notes completes this masculine scent.

fields.name: DOLCE & GABBANA K - Men's Gift Set
fields.description: This effortlessly joyful fragrance opens with notes of blood orange, zingy Sicilian lemon and tangy Juniper berries. This instantly refreshes and energizes the wearer, taking inspiration from the Mediterranean air. The heart is a unique twist of aromatic, herby notes with a kick of fiery Pimento. The fragrance is finished with a sensual base formed of Cedar, Vetiver and Patchouli.

fields.name: DOLCE & GABBANA K - Men's gift Set
fields.description: This effortlessly joyful fragrance opens with notes of blood orange, zingy Sicilian lemon and tangy juniper berries. This instantly refreshes and energizes the wearer, taking inspiration from the Mediterranean air.  The heart is a unique twist of aromatic, herby notes with a kick of fiery pimento. The fragrance is finished with a sensual base formed of Cedar, Vetiver and Patchouli.

fields.name: GIVENCHY GENTLEMAN SOCIETY (60ML) - Men's Aftershave Perfume spray
fields.description: The fragrance opens with top aromatic top notes of fresh sage combined with the floral notes of wild narcissus absolute. The notes contrast with the mysterious intensity of the vetiver. The warmth of vanilla melts with sandalwood and cedarwood essences to create the addictive base of this sophisticated men’s aftershave, leaving a memorable trail behind.

fields.name: GIVENCHY INSENSE ULTRAMARINE (100ML) - Men's Aftershave Spray
fields.description: The fragrance offers an enticing blend of deliciously diverse fruit essences. A succulent watermelon note combines with blackcurrant, galbanum and bergamot for a delicious fruity opening. The heart of the fragrance features an accord of iris, magnolia, mint, rosemary and cardamom creating a more savory accord. Finally a rich base of tobacco, vetiver and cedar provides a strong and woody base.

fields.name: GUCCI GUILTY POUR HOMME (50ML) - Men's Aftershave Perfume Spray
fields.description: This bold and captivating scent combines the finest of ingredients to bring forth a signature aroma that is truly unique. The top notes are a fusion of juniper, lavender, and lemon that make for an invigorating opening. The middle notes, on the other hand, blend the enchanting scents of orange blossom, nutmeg, and Spanish labdanum that enhance the allure of the fragrance. The base notes include patchouli, dry wood, and musk.

fields.name: GUCCI GUILTY POUR HOMME - Men's Gift Set
fields.description: A woody aromatic ambery fragrance that magnifies the true essence of the Gucci Guilty Pour Homme signature. A lighter, milder, and more modernized aromatic hook of French lavender abrialis and uplifting lemon that combines perfectly with the intensity of juniper. The fragrance is magnified at the heart with the deep ambery signature of Spanish labdanum combined with the floral richness of orange flower and a spicy hint of nutmeg. Finally, the mysterious elegance of Indonesian patchouli is reinforced with the long-lasting sensation of dry woods and musks.

fields.name: GUCCI GUILTY POUR HOMME - Men's Gift set
fields.description: A contemporary take on two iconic perfumery ingredients popular in the '70s, top notes of rose and chili pepper create an invigorating retro vibe, with hints of vinegar and salt for an unexpected finish. Orange blossom absolute, neroli and french Lavender add intensity, while patchouli and cedarwood accentuate the scent's richness and sensuality.

fields.name: HUGO BOSS HUGO MAN (75ML) - Men's Aftersave Spray
fields.description: Hugo Man by Hugo Boss is a fresh-aromatic fragrance for men. Opening with fruity top notes of green apple, mint, grapefruit leading to woody notes of fir and cedar.

fields.name: HUGO BOSS BOTTLED - Men's Gift Set
fields.description: A fresh and sharp fragrance with a warm woody base. The Boss Bottled man is driven, competitive and knows what he wants. The fragrance drives the Boss Man even further for it is not just a fragrance but has become a symbol of his ambition and sophistication. The fruity top notes of apple and citrus mix well with floral and spicy heart, dominated by pelargonium, warm cinnamon, and cloves. The base notes are very masculine: sandalwood, vetiver and precious cedar.

fields.name: HUGO BOSS HUGO - Men's Gift Set
fields.description: Opening with fruity top notes of green apple, mint, grapefruit leading to woody notes of fir and cedar.

fields.name: ISSEY MIYAKE FUSION D'ISSEY (100ML) - Men's Aftershave Spray
fields.description: This fragrance is an energetic fusion of nature and depth. Cool and blazing. A play on contrasts between the cold and the heat of warming spices. The explosive freshness from the beginning of the composition includes citrus and fruit aromas, lemon being one of them, and sweet coconut milk. The aromatic-spicy heart, pungent and fresh like a forest breeze, blends with the sunny amber base and a deep volcanic note of patchouli. A new masculinity, heat and cold to express the idea of the quintessence of molten rock.

fields.name: JACQUES BOGART ONE MAN SHOW (100ML) - Men's Aftershave Spray
fields.description: Complex, but easy to wear, perfect for day or night wear. Notes of caraway, basil and artemisia contribute spicy herbal properties while bergamot brings a refreshing citrus note. Galbanum adds depth with its resinous, balsamic character.

fields.name: JEAN PAUL GAULTIER LE MALE (125ML) - Men's Aftershave Spray
fields.description: Known for the unique bottle in the shape of a torso. The tin cans serve as the perfume's packaging. Containing notes of mint, lavender, vanilla, bergamot, cinnamon, cumin, orange blossom, tonka bean, sandalwood and cedarwood.

fields.name: JEAN PAUL GAULTIER SCANDAL POUR HOMME (100ML) - Men's Aftershave Spray
fields.description: An energizing and addictive eau de toilette fragrance. A modern woody oriental scent that packs a punch. The fragrance opens with freshness; sage and full-fruit mandarin sharpening the senses. Roasted tonka beans and caramel are at the heart adding to the masculine energy and the sensual base draws on notes of vetiver and cedar.

fields.name: JIMMY CHOO MAN BLUE - Men's Gift Set
fields.description: A dynamic and masculine scent with an instinctive woody aromatic leathery scent. An elegant scent with notes of leather and wood. It is considered to be a dynamic fragrance with a modern freshness, created for an extremely masculine man with an urban elegance.

fields.name: MONT BLANC EXPLORER PLATINUM (30ML) - Men's Aftershave Perfume Spray
fields.description: The fragrance opens with top notes of violet leaves, followed by middle notes of clary sage, and base notes of cedarwood. It has a fresh, spicy, and warm welcoming scent that gains a noticeable leathery and woody effect once it dries down. A beautiful fragrance that is perfect for anyone who loves fresh and spicy scents.

fields.name: MONT BLANC LEGEND RED (100ML) - Men's Aftershave Perfume Spray
fields.description: Legend Red by Montblanc is a citrus, woody fragrance for men. A bold, confident, powerful fragrance with strength, opens with a burst of blood oranges and zesty grapefruit, combined with a spicy touch of cardamom. The heart reveals the intense aromatic harmony of juniper berries and clary sage, strengthened with cedarwood, while the trail of mahogany, tonka beans, and Atlas cedar form the base of the fragrance.

fields.name: PACO RABANNE INVICTUS VICTORY EXTREME (100ML) - Men's Aftershave Perfume Spray
fields.description: A fragrance that shocks and seduces with its juxtaposing senses; emphatic freshness and magnetic intensity. It screams masculinity in a strong and beguiling manner. Two unique combinations are featured for a long-lasting scent. At the outset, a surprisingly fresh boost: sharp lemon mingles with powerful incense.

fields.name: PACO RABANNE 1 MILLION ROYAL (50ML) - Men's Aftershave Perfume Spray
fields.description: 1 Million Royal by Paco Rabanne is an Amber Woody fragrance for men.

fields.name: PACO RABANNE PURE XS (50ML) - Men's Aftershave Spray
fields.description: A vibrant fresh oriental scent with two accords that contrast and harmonize with each other, body to body, caught between excesses, hot and cold, gentle and intense, on edge, attracting each other. The fragrance starts with explosive freshness of the aphrodisiac ginger, then smoldering sensuality from cinnamon, followed by a surge of power with deep vanilla infused with leather, liquor and musk.

fields.name: PACO RABANNE INVICTUS (100ML) - Men's Aftershave
fields.description: The fragrance opens with fresh grapefruit and a marine accord that lead to the heart of aromatic bay leaf and Hedione jasmine and a woody base of guaiac wood, patchouli, oak moss and ambergris.

fields.name: PACO RABANNE INVICTUS - Men's Gift Set
fields.description: Inspired by the legends of Roman Gladiators. The masculine scent is in it to win it with its perfect match of fresh marine notes and sensual woods, making for a dangerous game. The bottle is designed in the shape of a trophy.

fields.name: PACO RABANNE 1 MILLION - Men's Gift Set
fields.description: Blood Mandarin and Peppermint capture your attention, blending a heart of rose absolute and cinnamon add a sweetness that stays close to the skin. A seriously seductive dry down of amber and leather keeps the 1 Million man in the minds of all he meets.

fields.name: PACO RABANNE PURE XS - Men's Gift Set
fields.description: A vibrant fresh oriental scent with two accords that contrast and harmonize with each other, body to body, caught between excesses, hot and cold, gentle and intense,  on edge, attracting each other. The fragrance starts with explosive freshness of the aphrodisiac  ginger, then smoldering sensuality from cinnamon, followed by a surge of power with deep vanilla infused with leather, liquor and musk. To end, sink into the pulsing warmth of myrrh dusted with sugar.

fields.name: POLICE TO BE KING (125ML) - Men's Aftershave Spray
fields.description: Opening with refreshing citrus and spice notes, along with artemisia, cashmere, amber, aromatic lavender on a base of woody notes, resins, orange blossom. Housed in the signature skull shaped bottle, coloured in black with a gold crown.

fields.name: VERSACE EROS - Men's Gift set
fields.description: Luminous with an intense freshness from mint leaves, Italian lemon zest and green apple. Well suited for the summer months with its refreshing aroma.

fields.name: YSL LA NUIT DE L'HOMME (60ML) - Men's Aftershave Spray
fields.description: A dark and powerful masculine fragrance full of contrasts and tensions. A timeless scent with an intoxicating silage. La Nuit de l'Homme opens with cardamom and sparkling freshness of bergamot, lavender and cedar. Cumin and vetiver in a base ensure an opulent finish. Attraction is at its height.

fields.name: ARMANI SI (30ML) - Women's Perfume Spray
fields.description: Say 'yes' to this irresistible, chic scent by Armani for the dependant, confident woman. Sultry and intense, but soft at the same time, Sì is a chypre scent reinvented. Lingering on the skin,  captivating the senses. Combining blackcurrant nectar, modern chypre and light musky woods, it leaves an unforgettable trail wherever you are.

fields.name: CALVIN KLEIN CK IN2U HER (100ML) - Women's
fields.description: Opening with a burst of pink grapefruit, with mouth watering sugar orchid, leading to a base full of seduction and satisfaction, with a lingering amber afterglow.

fields.name: CALVIN KLEIN OBSESSION NIGHT (100ML)  - Women's Perfume Spray
fields.description: Is an experimental and intense fragrance, reminiscent of warm summer nights. Opening with juicy citrus notes of bergamot, Mandarin orange and angelica, Calvin Klein Obsession Night moves to a floral heart of gardenia, jasmine, lily-of-the-valley and rose. To add additional warmth and smoothness to the fragrance, the base notes include sandalwood, cashmere, amber and vanilla.

fields.name: CAROLINA HERRERA 212 VIP (50ML) - Women's Perfume Spray
fields.description: Carolina Herrera 212 VIP is a glamorous fragrance for women. Inspired by a new generation of VIP in New York, the city that never sleeps. Magnetic and seduction, this is a modern icon for youth wanting to have fun and party, no matter what.

fields.name: CAROLINA HERRERA GOOD GIRL LEGERE (30ML) - Women's Perfume Spray
fields.description: Its mixture of sweet, fresh and sensual aromas highlighted a woman's ability to be both tough and tender. This new update lightened up the fragrance with a focus on bright citruses and light floral scents.

fields.name: CAROLINA HERRERA GOOD GIRL SUPREME (30ML) - Women's Perfume Spray
fields.description: The iconic fragrance reinvents herself with a daring new Supreme scent. Opening with juicy berries, Egyptian jasmine and creamy tonka bean on a base of vetiver gives a modern twist.

fields.name: CAROLINA HERRERA GOOD GIRL - Women's Gift Set
fields.description: Reveal your good or bad side with the luminous facet of tuberose and best quality Jasmine contrasted with the dangerously addictive notes of roasted tonka beans and Cocoa. Presented in a beautiful glass shoe bottle combining haute couture aesthetics with technical expertise, giving an innate sense of power.

fields.name: CAROLINA HERRERA VERY GOOD GIRL GLAM - Women's Gift Set
fields.description: Carolina Herrera Very Good Girl Glam is a fruity woody fragrance for women. A glam and chic fragrance with a hint of glitz for the woman who likes to party. Powerful and mysterious, it embodies female empowerment. Sashay the night away in style with this head-turning dazzling scent guaranteed to get you noticed. An olfactory woody delight of cherry, rose, and vanilla with sweet and savory contrasts. Intense cherry top notes define this scent, while the rose amplifies the feminine heart. A base of sustainably sourced vetiver and vanilla bourbon intensifies this fragrance's depth and character.

fields.name: CHLOE SIGNATURE - Women's Gift Set
fields.description: An iconic fragrance that will bring a smile to many generations, young and old. Chloe is a heady, sensuous and beautiful blend of lush peach, warm and intoxicating tuberose with a sumptuous base of amber, sandalwood and benzoin. Light, feminine yet seductively strong. A self-assured scent.

fields.name: CHLOE SIGNATURE - Women's Gift Set
fields.description: Chloe is a heady, sensuous and beautiful blend of lush peach, warm and intoxicating tuberose with a sumptuous base of amber, sandalwood and benzoin.

fields.name: CHOPARD WISH (75ML) - Women's Perfume Spray
fields.description: Chopard Wish is a oriental-vanilla fragrance. This sparkling, fresh fragrance contains notes of honeysuckle, wild strawberry, orange blossom, coconut,  Brazilian rosewood, violet, orchid, heliotrope, lily-of-the-valley, sandalwood, amber, patchouli, vanilla.

fields.name: CLINIQUE HAPPY - Women's Gift Set
fields.description: A hint of citrus. A wealth of flowers. A mix of emotions. Enjoy fresh, vibrant notes; ruby red grapefruit and bergamot with soft, sensual ones like the Hawaiian wedding flower, and spring mimosa.

fields.name: DAVIDOFF COOL WATER WOMAN - Women's Gift Set
fields.description: Cool Water Perfume for Her by Davidoff is a Floral fragrance for women. A refreshing and feminine fragrance with the sensuality of the sea. A floral gourmand scent with notes of juicy mangosteen and paradise flower. Described as more aquatic than its predecessor with sweetened, herbal loveliness. A fresh and vibrant choice for Spring, Summery months. For mate dates, play dates and love dates.
fields.include: 50ml EDT, 15ml EDT & Shower Gel, Body Lotion

fields.name: DAVIDOFF COOL WATER (50ML) - Women's
fields.description: A totally fresh sensation, cool and calm, Cool Water Woman is like a breath of fresh air. Light and breezy florals blended with sweet fruit for a revitalizing scent sensation. The transparent floral fragrance, with aquatic notes, sets a mood of  confident femininity. Fresh, juicy top notes of watermelon and pineapple introduce the delicate energy of a floral accord led by lily of the valley.

fields.name: DKNY GOLDEN DELICIOUS (30ML) - Women's Perfume Spray
fields.description: Celebrate luxury and style with DKNY Golden Delicious. Radiating lavish sensuality, dripping with gold. It's a tempting rich blend of juicy golden delicious apples with orange blossom, white rose, Casablanca lily, vanilla orchid, musk and sandalwood.

fields.name: DOLCE & GABBANA DOLCE ROSE (30ML) - Women's
fields.description: A flower we all know to symbolize love, beauty and femininity. Dolce Rose is an alluring and joyful fragrance radiating energy.

fields.name: DOLCE & GABBANA THE ONE (50ML) - Women's Perfume Spray
fields.description: A luxury perfume that transcends ordinary fragrances. Its unique oriental-floral-fruity composition is a one-of-a-kind blend of balanced, warm, and sensual notes. Let the sweet notes of mandarin, bergamot, litchi, and peach whisk you away from the everyday. Delight in the delicate layers of jasmine, lily of the valley, and white lily, perfectly complemented by the rich notes of plum. Finally, indulge in the mesmerizing scents coming from the base of vetiver root, amber, musk, and vanilla.

fields.name: DOLCE & GABBANA DOLCE LILY (50ML) - Women's
fields.description: A gorgeous Summery scent inspired by the pink lily flower. The Dolce girl is authentic and caring, the sparkling fragrance being a symbol of femininity and kindness. The fragrance is a bright fruity floral, combining the delicate floral signature of pink lily accord with exotic passion fruit and a background of soft, sensual musks.

fields.name: DOLCE & GABBANA THE ONLY ONE - Women's Gift Set
fields.description: This hypnotic, feminine oriental-floral fragrance captures the essence of sophistication. Opening with notes of violet, refreshing bergamot, addictive coffee, iris, orange blossom on a base of earthy patchouli and vanilla creates a divine scent.

fields.name: DOLCE & GABBANA THE ONE - Women's Gift Set
fields.description: An oriental floral-fruity fragrance that is warm and sensual with an added dose of femininity and freshness. The fragrance opens with fresh mandarin, bergamot, litchi and peach. The heart is thin and balmy, with the notes of jasmine, lily of the valley and white lily which graciously intertwines with the fruity touch of plum. The woodsy-powdery base is created of vetiver root, amber, musk and vanilla.

fields.name: ELIZABETH ARDEN WHITE DIAMONDS - Women's Gift Set
fields.description: With its floral and woody aroma, this scent is perfect for any occasion. Top notes of Aldehydes, Lily, Neroli, Orange, and Bergamot transport you to a world of elegance and class. The soft and subtle floral tones are balanced out with the fresh and invigorating citrus undertones.
fields.include: 100ml EDT, 10ml EDT & Body Lotion, Body Wash
